errors.message: A one to one relationship cannot be made with repeated field 'user' on Student
errors.hint: Either make 'user' non-repeated or define a new non-repeated field on Student. To learn more about relationships, visit https://docs.keel.so/models#relationships

errors.message: The field 'user' does not have an associated field on User
errors.hint: In a one to many relationship, the related belongs-to field must exist on User. To learn more about relationships, visit https://docs.keel.so/models#relationships
